name: Book of Sol: The Northern Light Chapters
name_original: Book of Sol: The Northern Light Chapters
description:
Hey everyone my name is Sal and I am developing a trilogy of free rpgs for you all to enjoy! The first one which is complete I might add is about a group of people saving the world from the treacherous Sol. There are roughly 16 playable characters and 20 - 30 hours of gameplay! Two endings two what if scenarios and hopefully alot of fun for you guys if you get stuck message me!
Game is a bit buggy but I will fix it eventually. Working on my next project The Book of Sol: The Guardian. I hope you all enjoy please let me know what you think!
